name: Bump NPM package version workflow
description: Before you are ready to merge the PR to the default branch, just mark it with the `bump-version` label and this workflow will run the `standard-version` utility for versioning using `semver` and `CHANGELOG` generation. When the workflow ends, the `bump-version` label will be removed and the label `version-bumped` will be added instead. (Don't use it with lerna)
